div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 224 Greece, western?, 1964 Burial: c. 190-188 B.C. (Franke) Contents: c. 50 AR Aetolian League:40-50 st. (all with ΦΙ - no rev. marks [3]; as Pozzi 1325 [1]; 1326 [1]; as Davis 129 [4]) ANS 1964.149.1 Thebes: 1 st. Aegina: 1 st. Elis: st. (as Seltman FC [1]; FF [1]) Sicyon: ? Disposition: New York 1 (Aetolia); N. Davis 129; Münz. and Med. F.P.L. 246, August 1964, no. 7 Information from various European correspon- dents. P. Franke has list of 42 coins and the ANS has casts of a few
